    Iconary: An AI powered drawing and guessing game

    Iconary showcases an AI system capable of playing a Pictionary-style drawing and guessing game together with a human partner. Team up with the AllenAI artificial intelligence to either draw or guess a set of unique phrases.

    Play with AllenAI
